name: KNOLSKAPE
overview: KNOLSKAPE develops products and services focusing on management training, assessments and research. The business simulations, virtual learning products and multimedia case studies developed by KNOLSKAPE are used at global top-10 B-schools and in Fortune 500 companies. In addition to products, KNOLSKAPE also provides academic computing services to B-schools that want to create digital assets. KNOLSKAPE delivers simulation based management training seminars in leading companies.
